entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
